snippet: Coursekit, a start-up based in New York, is looking to create a social platform that will revolutionize how students and teachers interact online around classes and seminars.
abstract: Coursekit, a start-up based in New York, is looking to create a social platform that will revolutionize how students and teachers interact online around classes and seminars.

headline.main: Coursekit Raises $5 Million to Reinvent the Classroom
